sqlMap.statement: SELECT DISTINCT S.idStructure, S.raisonSociale, S.numeroSiret, S.voie, S.commune, S.codePostal, S.idPays, S.estValidee, S.dateCreation FROM Structure S WHERE S.estValidee = #estValidee# ORDER BY S.dateCreation DESC LIMIT 0, 200
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# LIMIT 0,1
SELECT S.idStructure, S.raisonSociale FROM Structure S WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# LIMIT 0,1

SELECT S.idStructure, S.raisonSociale, S.numeroSiret, S.batimentResidence, S.voie, S.commune, S.codePostal, S.libCedex, S.idPays, S.idEffectif, S.idTypeStructure, S.idStatutJuridique, S.codeNAF_N5, S.telephone, S.fax, S.mail, S.siteWeb FROM Structure S WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# LIMIT 0,1
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# LIMIT 0,1

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN Service Se ON S.idStructure=Se.idStructure WHERE Se.idService = #idService# LIMIT 0,1

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT(#raisonSociale#,'%') ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Structure WHERE raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT('%',#raisonSociale#,'%')

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT(#raisonSociale#,'%') AND S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#codePostal#,'%') ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN Pays P ON S.idPays = P.idPays WHERE S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT('%',#raisonSociale#,'%') AND ( P.COG=#cog# OR P.CRPAY=#cog# ) ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN Pays P ON S.idPays = P.idPays WHERE S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT('%',#value#,'%') AND P.COG!=99100 AND P.CRPAY!=99100 ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.numeroSiret=#value# ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0 , 1

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.numeroSiret LIKE CONCAT(#siren#,'%') ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0 , 200
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.telephone=#telephone# ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200
SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE S.fax=#fax# ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure
S.voie LIKE CONCAT('%', #voie#,'%')
S.batimentResidence LIKE CONCAT('%',#batimentResidence#,'%')
S.commune LIKE CONCAT('%',#commune#,'%')
S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#codePostal#,'%')
S.idPays = #idPays#
ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN Service Se ON S.idStructure = Se.idStructure WHERE Se.nom LIKE CONCAT('%', #nom#,'%') AND S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#codePostal#,'%') ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN TypeStructure T ON T.idTypeStructure = S.idTypeStructure INNER JOIN NAF_N5 N5 ON N5.codeNAF_N5 = S.codeNAF_N5 INNER JOIN NAF_N1 N1 ON N1.codeNAF_N1 = N5.codeNAF_N1
S.idTypeStructure = #typeStructure#
N1.codeNAF_N1 = #nafN1#
S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#codePostal#,'%')
ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S INNER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE A.estValide = false AND S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT(#raisonSociale#,'%') AND A.dateCreation >= #dateDebut# AND A.dateCreation <= #dateFin# ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S INNER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE A.estValide = true AND S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT(#raisonSociale#,'%') AND A.dateCreation >= #dateDebut# AND A.dateCreation <= #dateFin# ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure WHERE A.idAccordPartenariat IS NULL AND S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT(#raisonSociale#,'%') ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0 , 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure INNER JOIN Service Se ON S.idStructure = Se.idStructure INNER JOIN Contact C ON Se.idService = C.idService INNER JOIN CentreGestion CG ON CG.idCentreGestion = C.idCentreGestion INNER JOIN NiveauCentre as N ON CG.idNiveauCentre = N.idNiveauCentre WHERE C.mail = #mail# AND N.libelleNiveauCentre = 'ENTREPRISE' AND C.login IS NOT NULL AND C.mdp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200

SELECT DISTINCT S.*, A.idAccordPartenariat FROM Structure S LEFT OUTER JOIN AccordPartenariat A ON S.idStructure = A.idStructure
INNER JOIN NAF_N5 N5 ON N5.codeNAF_N5 = S.codeNAF_N5 INNER JOIN NAF_N1 N1 ON N1.codeNAF_N1 = N5.codeNAF_N1
S.raisonSociale LIKE CONCAT('%',#raisonSociale#,'%')
S.numeroSiret = #numeroSiret#
S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#codePostal#,'%')
N1.codeNAF_N1 = #cNAF_N1#
S.codeNAF_N5 = #cNAF_N5#
S.codePostal LIKE CONCAT(#departement#,'%')
ORDER BY S.raisonSociale LIMIT 0, 200
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Structure S INNER JOIN Offre O ON O.idStructure = S.idStructure WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# AND O.estSupprimee=false
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Structure S INNER JOIN Convention C ON C.idStructure = S.idStructure WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Structure S INNER JOIN Service Se ON Se.idStructure = S.idStructure INNER JOIN Contact C ON Se.idService = C.idService WHERE S.idStructure = #idStructure# AND ( C.login IS NOT NULL AND C.mdp IS NOT NULL )
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO Structure (codeEtab, numeroSiret, raisonSociale, batimentResidence, voie, commune, codeCommune, codePostal, idPays, idEffectif, idStatutJuridique, idTypeStructure, libCedex, codeNAF_N5, activitePrincipale, telephone, fax, mail, siteWeb, groupe, logo, dateCreation, loginCreation, infosAJour, loginInfosAJour) VALUES (#codeEtab#, #numeroSiret#, #raisonSociale#, #batimentResidence#, #voie#, #commune#, #codeCommune#, #codePostal#, #idPays#, #idEffectif#, #idStatutJuridique#, #idTypeStructure#, #libCedex#, #codeNAF_N5#, #activitePrincipale#, #telephone#, #fax#, #mail#, #siteWeb#, #groupe#, #logo#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #loginCreation#, CURDATE(), #loginInfosAJour#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Structure SET codeEtab = #codeEtab#, numeroSiret=#numeroSiret#, raisonSociale = #raisonSociale#, batimentResidence = #batimentResidence#, voie=#voie#, commune = #commune#, codeCommune = #codeCommune#, codePostal = #codePostal#, idPays=#idPays#, idEffectif=#idEffectif#, idStatutJuridique=#idStatutJuridique#, idTypeStructure=#idTypeStructure#, libCedex=#libCedex#, codeNAF_N5=#codeNAF_N5#, activitePrincipale=#activitePrincipale#,telephone=#telephone#,fax=#fax#,mail=#mail#,siteWeb=#siteWeb#, groupe=#groupe#,logo=#logo#, dateModif = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), loginModif = #loginModif#, infosAJour = CURDATE(), loginInfosAJour = #loginInfosAJour# WHERE idStructure = #idStructure#
UPDATE Structure SET infosAJour = CURDATE(), loginInfosAJour = #loginInfosAJour# WHERE idStructure = #idStructure#
UPDATE Structure SET dateValidation = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), loginValidation = #loginValidation#, estValidee=1 WHERE idStructure = #idStructure#
UPDATE Structure SET dateStopValidation = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), loginStopValidation = #loginStopValidation#, estValidee=2 WHERE idStructure = #idStructure#
